code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Header(_ref){let{personalInfo,language}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"resume-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"header-content",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"profile-avatar",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"avatar-circle",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"avatar-text",children:(language==='th'?personalInfo.nameTh:personalInfo.nameEn).split(' ').map(n=>n[0]).join('')})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"profile-name",children:language==='th'?personalInfo.nameTh:personalInfo.nameEn}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"profile-title",children:language==='th'?personalInfo.titleTh:personalInfo.titleEn}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"profile-badges",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"badge",children:"Computer Engineering"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"badge",children:"Software Developer"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"badge",children:"Internship Experience"})]})]})]})})});}export default Header;

sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; function Header({ personalInfo, language }) { return (
{(language === 'th' ? personalInfo.nameTh : personalInfo.nameEn).split(' ').map(n => n[0]).join('')}

{language === 'th' ? personalInfo.nameTh : personalInfo.nameEn}

{language === 'th' ? personalInfo.titleTh : personalInfo.titleEn}

Computer Engineering Software Developer Internship Experience
); } export default Header;
